snippet.title: Pain Train Official Trailer
snippet.description: The subway has been overrun by an infected population who are lead by cyborg masterminds.  Pain Train brings the fast paced non stop action of a top down shooter to a first person world.  Shoot your way through 8 gore packed levels, complete side missions, unlock new weapons, and defeat all of the cyborg masterminds.  Pain Train is entering a subway station near you, "All Aboard!"
